title: Innocent Spouse Relief Request
description: A recently divorced individual has discovered their ex-spouse understated income on a previously filed joint return, and the IRS is now seeking payment from them.

tasks.description: Review the taxpayer's situation to see if they qualify for innocent spouse relief.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the client meets the criteria (e.g., had no knowledge of the understatement).

tasks.description: Gather evidence to support the claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles documentation proving the client's lack of knowledge and involvement.

tasks.description: Prepare and file Form 8857, Request for Innocent Spouse Relief.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits a complete and well-supported request to the IRS.
